name: 8allocate
description:
8allocate is a boutique provider of end-to-end custom software development and IT outsourcing solutions to companies looking to bridge tech talent gaps, save software development costs, future-proof business ideas or improve software delivery to end-users.
 
We build client-tailored dedicated software development teams and deliver turnkey PoC and full-fledged market-ready solutions for different business domains.
 
Using different engagement models, from augmented team to ad-hoc resources, we create a highly scalable and organic extension of an in-house/core software team, working to the same stack, the same KPIs and, most importantly, the same values our clients hold dear.
 
You retain 100% PM and delivery control, while we take care of your dedicated team hiring, HR, infrastructure and admin functions.
 
Alternately, we can take your project from the ground up and deliver a turnkey managed solution based on a T&M or hybrid engagement.
 
If you're looking to speed up your time to hire talent and hit the market and jump fast on the cutting-edge technology bandwagon – we're here to assist!
